label_setting_drag: Drag the boxes to add them to the home page
user_subtitle1: The new app of the Municipality of Trento
user_text1: This is My Trento, the new app of the city of Trento! All the mobile services of the Municipality of Trento will be gradually included in this app!
user_text2: In your personalized home page you will see only the functions that you are interested in!
user_text3: To start, tell us if you are a resident or a tourist: we'll show you the things that could interest you more. You can always change this later!
credits_cultura: Ufficio 'Cultura e Turismo' del Comune di Trento
home_setting_red: Premi sul rosso per rimuovere i moduli
home_setting_green: Premi sul verde per aggiungere i moduli
